# R env setup

## Install renv package

```{r}
install.packages("renv")
# press y in the console 
```

## Sync predefined packages

```{r}
renv::restore()
```

## Install new if needed

Better to install the packages used in the example file to avoid errors:

```{r}
install.packages(c("dplyr", "ggplot2", "readr", "tidyr"))
## or in console:
# renv::install(c("dplyr", "ggplot2", "readr", "tidyr"))
```

## Sync installed packages

Sync to ensure all packages are up to date:

```{r}
renv::snapshot()
```

## Troubleshooting

### renv Not Activating Automatically

If renv doesn't activate when you open the project:

```{r}
source("renv/activate.R")
renv::restore()
```
